scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Becky
scrape.text: I sort of liked this book, but I didn't agree with the reviews on the back cover as I didn't find this book "so very funny" or "addictive" or "great satire". I think I missed the satire - maybe I just didn't understand this book? The story is pretty straightforward, and there isn't anything particularly shocking about it.
